personal.name: Md Ali Khan
personal.title: AI/ML Engineer | Automation Specialist
personal.bio: AI/ML practitioner (B.Tech 2025) bridging the gap between Deep Learning models and intelligent automation. Experienced in building Multi-Agent Systems, Automation Pipelines, and Computer Vision solutions. Passionate about "First Principles" thinking and treating AI problems as engineering challenges.

achievements: Relevant Coursework: DSA, OOP, Deep Learning, NLP
Specialization in Multi-Agent Systems and Automation

experience.description: Optimized ML models (15% error reduction) and automated data ingestion pipelines (40% speed improvement).
Built a voice-controlled AI assistant, reducing task execution time by 25%.

projects.title: AI Support Multi-Agent Platform
projects.description: Built a high-performance customer support platform featuring a multi-agent backend capable of maintaining conversational context across sessions. Developed a type-safe API using Hono and integrated Vercel AI SDK with Google Gemini and OpenAI models. Managed as a monorepo with Turborepo, using PostgreSQL (Supabase) and Prisma ORM for efficient data handling.

projects.title: Automated Resume Customization Pipeline
projects.description: Engineered an automated ETL workflow using first principles thinking to map candidate experiences to job descriptions. Integrated Groq API for intelligent rewriting and PDF parsing for data extraction.

projects.title: ADGM Corporate Agent
projects.description: Built a Streamlit-based AI assistant integrating Groq API for corporate document Q&A. Implemented RAG with ChromaDB to deliver context-aware responses from uploaded files. Designed an interactive UI for real-time queries and file uploads, with containerized deployment.

projects.title: Multi-Modal AI Voice & Vision Assistant
projects.description: Developed a voice-enabled assistant with NLP-based command parsing. Integrated Whisper for speech recognition and TTS. Implemented OCR, YOLOv8 for object detection, and BLIP for scene description. Features include app launching (Notepad, Office), file/web search, memory recall, and schedule management. Secured API access with modularized codebase.

projects.title: AI Pest Control System
projects.description: Built a deep learning model using MobileNetV2 to classify 12 pest types with 85%+ validation accuracy. Balanced dataset using augmentation (500 images per class) and fine-tuned the model with transfer learning. Integrated a recommendation system that maps pests to natural, non-toxic pesticides. Created a prediction interface utilizing Matplotlib.

internship.goals: Bridging the gap between Deep Learning models and intelligent automation pipelines.

funFacts: Bridges gap between DL models and automation
Treats resume writing as a data mapping problem
personality.workingStyle: I treat AI problems as engineering challenges.
personality.motivation: Solving complex problems with First Principles thinking.
